trans-unit.source: Specifies the quality of text rendering.
The quality ranges from text (fastest performance, but lowest quality) to antialiased text (better quality, but slower performance) to ClearType text (best quality on an LCD display).
trans-unit.target: 质量的范围为文本 （最快的性能，但质量最低） 到消除锯齿的文本 （质量较好，但性能变慢） 到 ClearType 文本 （在 LCD 显示器上的质量最佳）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextContrast%2A> properties and the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextContrast%2A>属性和<xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>枚举。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into a form and call the `ChangeTextRenderingHintAndTextContrast` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ChangeTextRenderingHintAndTextContrast`方法时处理该窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Each character is drawn using its antialiased glyph bitmap without hinting.
trans-unit.target: 在无提示的情况下使用每个字符的抗锯齿效果标志符号位图来绘制字符。
由于采用了 AntiAlias，质量会得到改善。

trans-unit.source: Stem width differences may be noticeable because hinting is turned off.
trans-unit.target: 由于关闭了提示，主干宽度差可能会比较明显。

trans-unit.source: Each character is drawn using its antialiased glyph bitmap with hinting.
trans-unit.target: 在有提示的情况下使用每个字符的抗锯齿效果标志符号位图来绘制字符。

trans-unit.source: Much better quality due to antialiasing, but at a higher performance cost.
trans-unit.target: 由于采用了 AntiAlias，质量会得到大大改善，但同时会增加性能成本。

trans-unit.source: Each character is drawn using its glyph ClearType bitmap with hinting.
trans-unit.target: 在有提示的情况下使用每个字符的标志符号 ClearType 位图来绘制字符。

trans-unit.source: Used to take advantage of ClearType font features.
trans-unit.target: 用于利用 ClearType 字体功能。

trans-unit.source: Each character is drawn using its glyph bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 使用每个字符的标志符号位图来绘制字符。

trans-unit.source: Each character is drawn using its glyph bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 使用每个字符的标志符号位图来绘制字符。

trans-unit.source: Hinting is used to improve character appearance on stems and curvature.
trans-unit.target: 提示用于改善字符在主干和弯曲部分的外观。

trans-unit.source: Each character is drawn using its glyph bitmap, with the system default rendering hint.
trans-unit.target: 在有系统默认呈现提示的情况下使用每个字符的标志符号位图来绘制字符。

trans-unit.source: The text will be drawn using whatever font-smoothing settings the user has selected for the system.
trans-unit.target: 将采用用户为系统选择的任何字体修匀设置来绘制文本。
